title.value: US Public Health Report Initiation Type Codes

description.value: The US Public Health Report Initiation Type CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying how the message was initiated.

display.value: Indicates a report was initiation based on a Subscription Notification.

definition.value: Indicates that a report creation was initiated based on a notification to a subscription topic.

display.value: Indicates a report was initiation based on a Subscription Notification.

definition.value: Indicates that a report creation was initiated based on a timer expiration. The timer can be absolute or a relative timer.

display.value: Indicates a report was initiated to a manual action by the provider.

definition.value: Indicates that a report creation was initiated manually by a provider.

display.value: Indicates a report was initiated in an alternate way by the provider.

definition.value: Indicates that a report creation was initiated in an alternate way by the provider.
